TextBlock.Text: BEGIN FLIGHTLOG: <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>. <color=orange>Vessel</color> has been mortally injured. Emergency sequence activated. Awaiting departure from <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
Launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>... Launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 2</color>... Now launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 1</color>.

Scanning external environment... Scan complete. Spatial anomaly detected. No oxygen detected. No organic life detected. Verdict: EVACUATION RECOMMENDED.
